about_the_game:
Hi Everyone !

We're very happy and proud to release Jumper, Jumpy Time Attack Adventure in Early Access Today !

Our game is a 2D platformer arcade style, the goal is to stay alive as long as possible, jump on as many platforms as possible, stay as high on the screen as possible and collect bonuses as much as possible to earn more points but be careful for traps ! As the score is increasing so is the difficulty and the speed.

The game features several modes :

Time Attack

It's you against you ! Setup the games bonus/malus you see fit and try to stay alive as long as you can. The learning curve can be steep in the beginning but we promise it smoothen quite fast... the more you jump...

If you tried the demo, you know the drill. We've added a link to Steam Leaderboards and you'll be able to see the worldwide top 10 !

Adventure

Jump into the story mode of Jumpy with the first level including 4 stages and a boss. Jumpy needs to get out of the cave and fight the terrible (or maybe not so terrible ?) Rooroo.

Multiplayer

Up to 3 players can each jump is own way up and collect malus that will affect their opponents. When the winner is chosen, then it starts again ! You can either play while sitting in front of the same screen or use Steam Remote Play Together to invite your friends on steam to play. Only one player needs to own the game, the other two can join for free !

What's Next !?

The early access will allow us to build a community for our game as well as getting feedback on the features we're developping. We will iterate on a number of things but 2 main features will be developped while the game is in early access :

[olist]

  • The Adventure will expand with 2 more levels including 4 to 5 stages each and a boss. While you may have gotten out of the cave and may have vainquished the terrible Rooroo, we still have more for you to get your teeth into

  • The Multiplayer mode will be improved with a score system to declare a winner in the battles as well as several quality of life enhancements.

[/olist]

We're eager for you to Jump in !

Hi Everyone !

We're very happy and proud to release Jumper, Jumpy Time Attack Adventure in Early Access Today !

Our game is a 2D platformer arcade style, the goal is to stay alive as long as possible, jump on as many platforms as possible, stay as high on the screen as possible and collect bonuses as much as possible to earn more points but be careful for traps ! As the score is increasing so is the difficulty and the speed.

The game features several modes :

It's you against you ! Setup the games bonus/malus you see fit and try to stay alive as long as you can. The learning curve can be steep in the beginning but we promise it smoothen quite fast... the more you jump...

If you tried the demo, you know the drill. We've added a link to Steam Leaderboards and you'll be able to see the worldwide top 10 !

Adventure

Jump into the story mode of Jumpy with the first level including 4 stages and a boss. Jumpy needs to get out of the cave and fight the terrible (or maybe not so terrible ?) Rooroo.

Up to 3 players can each jump is own way up and collect malus that will affect their opponents. When the winner is chosen, then it starts again ! You can either play while sitting in front of the same screen or use Steam Remote Play Together to invite your friends on steam to play. Only one player needs to own the game, the other two can join for free !

What's Next !?

The early access will allow us to build a community for our game as well as getting feedback on the features we're developping. We will iterate on a number of things but 2 main features will be developped while the game is in early access :

We're eager for you to Jump in !

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3, 1GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad advised

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 13, 14
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 13, 14
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad advised

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i3, 1GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 Quad Core, 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad advised

short_description: Jumper is a 2D platformer arcade style, the goal is to stay alive as long as possible, jump on as many platforms as possible but be careful for traps ! As the score is increasing so is the difficulty and the speed.
